casebody.data:
JACKSON
v.
CENTURY MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY 337A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 22, 2018 Tony S. Botros, Attorney at Law, for Jackson, Thomas, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Century Mutual Insurance Company.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of January 2018 by Plaintiff to Amend Reply Brief with Proposed Amended Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of January 2018."
